rangedTraits.name: Adhesive Charge
rangedTraits.description: Your Grenades stick to Monstrosities.

rangedTraits.name: Between the Eyes
rangedTraits.description: Clears Suppression (Self) & grants Suppression Immunity (Self) for 0.5-0.9s on Weak Spot Hit.

rangedTraits.name: Blaze Away
rangedTraits.description: Up to +2% Power based on how long you keep shooting.

rangedTraits.name: Blazing Spirit (Staffs)
rangedTraits.description: Enemy gains +1-2 Stacks of Soulblaze on Critical Hit.

rangedTraits.name: Born in Blood
rangedTraits.description: +1-2.5% Toughness on Close Range Kill.

rangedTraits.name: Can Opener
rangedTraits.description: +1-4 Rending on Special Attack (Armoured enemies).

rangedTraits.name: Cavalcade
rangedTraits.description: +1-4% Critical Chance. Stracks up to 5 based on duration of Continuous Fire.

rangedTraits.name: Ceaseless Barrage
rangedTraits.description: Continuous firing increases Suppression over time.

rangedTraits.name: Charmed Reload
rangedTraits.description: +4-10 Bullets loaded on Critical Hit.

rangedTraits.name: Crucian Roulette
rangedTraits.description: +2-5% Critical Chance for each empty chamber in your weapon.

rangedTraits.name: Deadly Accurate
rangedTraits.description: Adds 30-50% additional damage on crit weakspot hits.

rangedTraits.name: Deathspitter
rangedTraits.description: +5-6.5% Power for 1-1.375 seconds on Close Range Kill.

rangedTraits.name: Dumdum
rangedTraits.description: +1-2.5% Close Range damage on Repeated Hit. Stacks 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Efficiency
rangedTraits.description: +33% Reduced Ammo use after not shooting for 5.5-4 seconds.

rangedTraits.name: Expansive
rangedTraits.description: +2-5% Melee Power for 4 seconds on Hitting 3+ Enemies with a Ranged Attack.

rangedTraits.name: Falter
rangedTraits.description: +30-60% Target Stagger on Weak Spot Hit.

rangedTraits.name: Fan the Flames
rangedTraits.description: Primary Attack ignores 30-60% Stagger Resistance on Burning Enemies.

rangedTraits.name: Fire Frenzy
rangedTraits.description: Gain a 5-10% Power increase against nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds after killing an enemy at close range.

rangedTraits.name: Flechette
rangedTraits.description: +1 Bleed Stacks on Critical Hit.

rangedTraits.name: Focused Channeling
rangedTraits.description: Your Secondary Attack cannot be interrupted.

rangedTraits.name: Full Bore
rangedTraits.description: +2-5% Power for 5 seconds when every pellet in a shot hits the same enemy.

rangedTraits.name: Gets Hot!
rangedTraits.description: Up to +5-12.5% Critical Chance (scales on Heat Level).

rangedTraits.name: Ghost
rangedTraits.description: Immune to ranged attacks for 0.5-1.0 seconds on weak spot hit.

rangedTraits.name: Gloryhunter
rangedTraits.description: +4-10% Toughness on Elite Kill.

rangedTraits.name: Hand-Cannon
rangedTraits.description: +20-50% Rending on Critical Hit.

rangedTraits.name: Headhunter
rangedTraits.description: +2-5% Critical Chance on Weak Spot Hit until your next Critical Hit. Stacks 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Hit & Run
rangedTraits.description: Immune to Ranged Attacks for 0.3-0.7 seconds on Close Range Kill.

rangedTraits.name: Infernus (Infantry Lasgun & Helbore Lasgun)
rangedTraits.description: +2-3 Burn Stacks on Critical Hit to a maximum of 6-9 Stacks(s)

rangedTraits.name: Infernus (Laspistol)
rangedTraits.description: +2-3 Burn Stacks on Critical Hit to a maximum of 6-9 Stacks(s)

rangedTraits.name: Infernus (Recon Lasgun)
rangedTraits.description: +1-2 Burn Stacks on Critical Hit to a maximum of 6-9 Stacks(s)

rangedTraits.name: Inspiring Barrage
rangedTraits.description: Replenish 10% Toughness over time during Continuous Fire. Stacks up to 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Man-Stopper
rangedTraits.description: Increased Cleave on Critical Hit.

rangedTraits.name: No Respite
rangedTraits.description: Up to +10-20% Damage on Hit (Staggered Enemy), scaling with Stagger.

rangedTraits.name: Onslaught
rangedTraits.description: Chaining Charged Attacks reduces their Charge Time by -4-10%. Stacks 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Opening Salvo
rangedTraits.description: +5-15% Power on Salvos First shot.

rangedTraits.name: Overwhelming Fire
rangedTraits.description: +1-2.5% Power on Chained Ranged Hit (Same Target). Stacks 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Overpressure
rangedTraits.description: Up to +2-5% Power, scaling with remaining Ammunition. Stacks 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Pierce
rangedTraits.description: Special Attacks ignore Hit Mass Bonus from Armour.

rangedTraits.name: Pinning Fire
rangedTraits.description: +5-20% Power for every Enemy you Stagger. Stacks 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Pinpointing Target
rangedTraits.description: Up to +5-20% Power based on the Charge Time of your Weapon special and Melee Attacks. Stacks 3 times.

rangedTraits.name: Point Blank
rangedTraits.description: +15-20% Ranged Critical Chance on Kill for 2 seconds.

rangedTraits.name: Powderburn
rangedTraits.description: +5-20% Suppression and +5-20% Recoil on close range kill.

rangedTraits.name: Punishing Fire
rangedTraits.description: +2-5% Power on Ranged Attacks for 3 seconds on Multiple Hit Special Attack.

rangedTraits.name: Punishing Salvo
rangedTraits.description: +5-20% Weak Spot Damage on Second and Third shots in a Salvo.

rangedTraits.name: Quickflame
rangedTraits.description: +5-10% Reload Speed if empty.

rangedTraits.name: Raking Fire
rangedTraits.description: +15-30% Damage when shooting Enemies in the back.

rangedTraits.name: Reassuringly Accurate
rangedTraits.description: +5-10% Toughness on Critical Hit Kill

rangedTraits.name: Rending Shockwave
rangedTraits.description: Up to +2-8 Rending, scaling with your charge time of Secondary Attack.

rangedTraits.name: Roaring Advance
rangedTraits.description: 2.5-10% Movement Speed while firing.

rangedTraits.name: Run N Gun
rangedTraits.description: You can Hipfire with this weapon while Sprinting.

rangedTraits.name: Scattershot
rangedTraits.description: +4% Critical Chance for 4 seconds on Multiple Hit.

rangedTraits.name: Shattering Impact
rangedTraits.description: +1-4 Rending (Armoured Enemies).

rangedTraits.name: Showstopper
rangedTraits.description: +5-20% Elite enemy Explodes on kill.

rangedTraits.name: Speedload
rangedTraits.description: +5-10% Reload Speed for 2 seconds after Sliding.

rangedTraits.name: Stripped Down
rangedTraits.description: +3-9% Sprint Speed (Weapon is Active).

rangedTraits.name: Surge
rangedTraits.description: 2 Shots on Critical Hit.

rangedTraits.name: Surgical
rangedTraits.description: +2-5% Critical Chance while aming. Builds Stacks over time. Stacks 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Sustained Fire
rangedTraits.description: +5-15% Damage on Second and Third shots in a Salvo

rangedTraits.name: Terrifying Barrage
rangedTraits.description: Suppress Enemies within 3-9m Radius on Close range Kill.

rangedTraits.name: Transfer Peril
rangedTraits.description: Quell 4.5% of your Peril on Weak Spot Hit.

rangedTraits.name: Trickshooter
rangedTraits.description: 2-5% Power on Chained Weak Spot Hit (Any Target). Stacks 5 Times.

rangedTraits.name: Volatile Impact
rangedTraits.description: +1-4% Charge Speed on low Overheat. Stacks up to 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Warp Flurry
rangedTraits.description: +-4-10% Charge Rate on chained Secondary Attack. Stacks 5 times.

rangedTraits.name: Warp Nexus
rangedTraits.description: Increases your critical hit chance by 2-5% at different increments of Peril up to 4 stacks.
